attributes.action: Next summer move the clocks forwards and leave them.
attributes.additional_details: The health of everyone will be boosted as they will be able to travel home knowing that they can do something outside, this will get people out more, good for health and less reliance on electricity of an evening.
attributes.background: There is no need in this day and age for farmers to not work using powerful lights on tractors or people can use torches if need

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Make Daylight Saving Time Permanent in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702292
